name: Train Simulator: ScotRail Class 380 EMU Add-On
summary: The Class 380 electric multiple unit is a great modern image British train, and runs on the Glasgow Airport Rail Link route (also available for Train Simulator). A total of 38 Class 380 sets were ordered for introduction on electrified routes in Scotland. The 38 units comprise a total of 130 vehicles forming a mixture of 3 and 4 car sets.
